name: dkode-website-backend
description: This is the backend application for the DKODE website, built with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. It provides a secure RESTful API for managing website content, including blogs, images, and text files. The app features JWT-based authentication, bcrypt password hashing, and supports full CRUD operations for content management, ensuring secure user registration and login.
